instruction: Perform wavelet analysis on time-series signals to analyze time-frequency characteristics. Implement continuous and discrete wavelet transforms, scalogram visualization, and multi-resolution analysis for signal decomposition and feature extraction.
description: Implement wavelet analysis techniques for time-frequency analysis of signals. Perform continuous and discrete wavelet transforms with scalogram visualization.
keywords: wavelet analysis, time-frequency, scalogram, signal decomposition, multi-resolution, python, pywt, scipy, CWT, DWT
